game.name: Incremental Dungeon
game.genres: Casual, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime
game.shortDescription: Incremental Dungeon is an incremental game in which you fight combatants with exponentially increasing strength via an auto-battler system. Each defeated opponent on the main path unlocks new equipment, shops, or other ways of empowering your build!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Incremental Dungeon is an incremental game in which you fight combatants with exponentially increasing strength via an auto-battler system. Each defeated opponent on the main path unlocks new equipment, shops, or other ways of empowering your build!
